alert.note: Alert for Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 03 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following county, Newberry. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Newberry, Prosperity, Newberry College, Newberry County Airport, Silverstreet, Newberry County Detention Center, Bush River Fire Station, Stoney Hill, US-176 and SC-34 Crossroads, Wyses Ferry, Mid-Carolina High School and Chappells Fire Station. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 65 and 82. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Flooded roadways are nearly impossible to see at night. Avoid traveling in this area. Turn around, don`t drown.
